attributes.action: ankylosing spodylightus and fybromalgia to be treated as long term conditions
attributes.background: Ankylosing spodylightus and fybromalgia is a chronic condition that makes people suffer in chronic wide spread pain chronic fatigue, head aches. And is not seen as a life time condtion. With these illness there is no cure and is for life

rejection.details:
Thank you for your petition. We understand that you'd like to see a change in how these conditions are considered, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

In any case, the NHS describes both as "long-term conditions", so we're not sure what else you'd like to happen. 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/fibromyalgia/
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/ankylosing-spondylitis/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example you could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to fund a campaign to raise awareness of the effects of fibromyalgia and ankylosing-spondylitis, if that's what you'd like to happen.
